_header: A Jesu Christ crown of maidens all
Subjects: saints’ lives; Katherine of Alexandria, saint, life of
_description: John Capgrave, Life of St Katherine — rhyme royal

BodRawPoe118.First Lines:
Iesu cryst crowne of maydenys alleA mayde bare þe mayde
                    ȝaue þe soke…
BodRawPoe118.Last Lines:
…God our lord for his hye mercyGraunt us heuene aftyr þis
                    mysery
BodRawPoe118.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             John Capgrave: the Life of St. Katherine of Alexandria.
Early English Text Society
         o.s. 100 (1893): 2-260 (bks. 1-3).
Winstead,  Karen A.,
                        ed.  
             The Life of St Katherine.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 1999.

BLAru20.First Lines:
SVm tym þair was a grete kyng in greceoff surry and cypre both
                    lorde & syreAs clark tell vs in olde storeceAll thyng was rewlyd
                    at hys desyre…
BLAru20.Last Lines:
…And specyall succur yn þis perilous pylgrymageþat
                    after þis lyue we mey cum to thy cage
BLAru20.Note:
Lacks prologue. Two verse lines per manuscript line. Final stanzas
                    differ from other manuscript witnesses of the same text.

BLAru168.First Lines:
O Jhesu criste croune of maydyns allA mayde bare þe a mayde
                    ȝaf þe soke…
BLAru168.Last Lines:
…God oure lord for his hye mercyGraunte vs heuene aftir
                    þis myserie
BLAru168.Attributed Author:
Explicit vita sancte Katerine facta per doctore Capgraue (f.
                        65rb)
BLAru168.Attributed Title:
Explicit vita sancte Katerine facta per doctore Capgraue (f.
                        65rb)

BLAru396.First Lines:
A ihesu crist crovne of maydenes alleA mayde bare the a mayde
                    ȝave þe sook…
BLAru396.Last Lines:
…God oure lord for his hye mercyGraunte vs heuene after thys
                    mysery. Amen
